dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Does anyone actually care about, like, another energy conference in, uh, Central Asia? Does this even do anything?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Does anyone actually care about, like, another energy conference in, uh, Central Asia? Does this even do anything?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, no, but it really does! This Downstream Caspian forum, it's, um, it's actually pretty pivotal this year.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, no, but it really does! This Downstream Caspian forum, it's, um, it's actually pretty pivotal this year.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: "Pivotal" for what? More, like, suits talking about oil numbers we can't even grasp?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Pivotal for what? More, like, suits talking about oil numbers we can't even grasp?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Well, yeah, but it's, um, showing some real movement. Kazakhstan, right? They just had KazMunayGas list these huge $2.75 billion Eurobonds.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, yeah, but it's, um, showing some real movement. Kazakhstan, right? They just had KazMunayGas list these huge two point seven five dollars billion Eurobonds.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: London Stock Exchange welcomes KazMunayGas lists $2.75bn Eurobonds

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Two point seven billion? Okay, that's, like, a number. Is that even good?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Two point seven billion? Okay, that's, like, a number. Is that even good?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: It's the biggest corporate bond issuance from the entire CIS region since, uh, 2015. I mean, that shows serious investor confidence.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's the biggest corporate bond issuance from the entire C I S region since, uh, twenty fifteen. I mean, that shows serious investor confidence.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Its largest corporate bond issuance from CIS region since 2014

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Or, like, serious need for cash.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Or, like, serious need for cash.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: No, no, and they’re building a brand new oil refinery too, you know, for, uh, $420 million. That’s a massive project.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No, no, and they're building a brand new oil refinery too, you know, for, uh, four hundred twenty dollars million. That's a massive project.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Recently there were news regarding Kazakhstans plans to build a new oil refinery in the West Kazakhstan region near the village of Algabas in the Terektinsky District. The total cost of this project is estimated at $420 million.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Another refinery. Yawn.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Another refinery. Yawn.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: But it's not just Kazakhstan! Uzbekistan and Turkmenistan are, um, really advancing their downstream sectors. Turkmenistan just opened this amazing, like, state-of-the-art plant.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But it's not just Kazakhstan! Uzbekistan and Turkmenistan are, um, really advancing their downstream sectors. Turkmenistan just opened this amazing, like, state-of-the-art plant.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Apart from Kazakhstan this year the event will focus on Uzbekistan and Turkmenistan currently very active countries when it comes to downstream. Turkmenistan has just launched a production plant of gasoline from natural gas... Uzbekistan is also actively developing its downstream sector.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: What's, uh, amazing about it?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: What's, uh, amazing about it?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: It turns natural gas into gasoline! Fifteen thousand barrels a day capacity. That’s, uh, pretty cutting-edge, right?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It turns natural gas into gasoline! Fifteen thousand barrels a day capacity. That's, uh, pretty cutting-edge, right?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Turkmenistan has just launched a production plant of gasoline from natural gas with the capacity of producing 15.5 thousand barrels of gasoline per day

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Gas into gasoline? Sounds like a lot of extra steps.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Gas into gasoline? Sounds like a lot of extra steps.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: And they're investing, like, $3 billion into modernizing existing refineries too. And Uzbekistan has this huge $30 billion program to boost refined export products.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And they're investing, like, three dollars billion into modernizing existing refineries too. And Uzbekistan has this huge thirty dollars billion program to boost refined export products.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Turkmenistan... is actively modernizing its refineries. Uzbekistan is also actively developing its downstream sector. According to Uzbekneftegaz, a programme worth 30.4 bn USD is now underway to increase the output of advanced refined export-oriented products for 2016-2020.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So, like, more oil, more gas, more money. Still sounds like the same old story to me.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, like, more oil, more gas, more money. Still sounds like the same old story to me.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: But it's, um, about the region becoming a serious global player in energy processing, you know? Not just, like, extracting, but refining. Adding value.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But it's, um, about the region becoming a serious global player in energy processing, you know? Not just, like, extracting, but refining. Adding value.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Or, uh, just playing catch-up. Seems like a lot of, um, numbers for not much new.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Or, uh, just playing catch-up. Seems like a lot of, um, numbers for not much new.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: The attendance at this forum, though! It's, like, way up. Twenty senior representatives from key companies. It shows, uh, growing international interest!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: The attendance at this forum, though! It's, like, way up. Twenty senior representatives from key companies. It shows, uh, growing international interest!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: All in all the delegation will consist of 15 senior representatives including the heads and managers from the Modernization and Perspective Projects Department of the Kazakhstans national oil company.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Growing interest in… what, exactly? More forums?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Growing interest in... what, exactly? More forums?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: In the future of energy development in a crucial, uh, region! It's actually, um, really important.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: In the future of energy development in a crucial, uh, region! It's actually, um, really important.
